loginPage.title: Please sign in
loginPage.usernameLengthError: Username must be an email address between 8 and 30 characters

forgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot password?
forgotPasswordPage.text: You can reset your password here.
forgotPasswordPage.usernameLengthError: Username must be an email address between 8 and 30 characters
forgotPasswordPage.complete: If an account exists with the username you entered, then we've emailed you instructions for setting your new password.  If you don't receive an email from us, please verify your username and also check your spam folder.

resetPasswordPage.title: Change password
resetPasswordPage.text: Enter your new password below. Passwords must be a minimum of 8 characters
resetPasswordPage.passwordLengthError: Password must be between 8 and 30 characters
resetPasswordPage.verifying: We are verifying the reset link.  Please standby.
resetPasswordPage.linkExpired: The reset link you used has expired or has already been used.  Please try resetting your password again.  Note: You must use the link we send you within 24 hours.
resetPasswordPage.passwordChanged: Your password has been successfully changed.  Please sign in.
resetPasswordPage.passwordChangedHome: Your password has been successfully changed.

clearAlertsDialog.title: Are you sure you want to clear all the alerts?
clearAlertsDialog.titleconf: Are you sure you want to clear the alert?

hubStatus.title: Hub Status
hubStatus.systemDown: One or more required component in the system are currently unavailable.
hubStatus.systemUnreachable: Could not connect to the API Health endpoint. Back-end system may be down.
hubStatus.noStatus: The status of the system has not be determined yet.

processingQueue.title: Processing Queue Status
processingQueue.emptyQueue: There are no messages currently queued to be processed.
processingQueue.messagesQueued: There are {{number}} messages currently queued to be processed.

deadLetterQueue.title: Dead Letter Queue Status
deadLetterQueue.emptyQueue: There are no messages currently queued in the dead letter queue.
deadLetterQueue.messagesQueued: There are {{number}} failed messages currently queued in the dead letter queue.
